name: improver
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes changes to something in order to improve it: home improver There are a number of environmentally friendly flooring alternatives available for home improvers.
UK someone who is becoming better at a skill: We run swimming classes for improvers.
UK a substance that is added to something to improve its quality: flour improver Our bread does not contain preservatives, flour improvers, or other additives.soil improver Dig in plenty of organic soil improver.
